content: Contact our Learn to Row coordinator to request an application form, or apply online.
name: Apply

content: We’ll explain the basics and show you our boats, boathouse and other facilities. You’ll be introduced to the rowing stroke. After the taster session you can decide to apply for a place on the course.
name: Attend a 90 minute taster session

content: The programme’s a mix of theory and coached practical on the water. We aim to organise the programme so you start with others at your standard, so you can develop your skills together.
name: Complete the Learn to Row programme

content: Before you join the club as a regular member, you’ll need to attend a capsize drill (it takes place at a local pool and lasts a couple of hours).
name: Attend a capsize drill

content: You’ll attend regular coached sessions and develop your skills with other new members.
name: Move into our Development Squad

content: Move into one of our rowing squads and enjoy your new sport.
name: Move into a rowing squad
